thread.title: Ceelo and Girl Crush Give Us the Strangest Grammy Fashion
thread.title_full: Ceelo and Girl Crush Give Us the Strangest Grammy Fashion

title: Ceelo and Girl Crush Give Us the Strangest Grammy Fashion
text: I am just so confused about how you're supposed to actually function in this gown. Like, can you sit? Can you even? How are they attached? This is stressing me out. Meanwhile, Ceelo showed up looking like a Trump Tower Luchador. Getty Why did he come to the Grammys dressed as an Oscar? This is also drag. He is giving you Lego Dowager Medusa realness. As if that weren't already too much, he showed up to a pre-Grammy party looking like the evil version of whatever he's currently dressed as. Getty Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Yas, Dollar Store Darth Vader! I guess we've reached the point where problematic artists are no just showing up as actual villains. Which brings me to... Oh, just wait... Advertisement - Continue Reading Below The front says "Make America Great Again," the back says "Trump" and the whole thing says "Oh, honey, no." GIF Most Popular This is so close to Macy Gray's iconic MTV Music Video Awards gown that I almost love it. Getty But the crucial difference is Macy selling her album, whereas Joy Villa is shilling a campaign for in an election that is already over. If you want to stan for something, stan for your own pockets. I will say, those letters on the train are bedazzled for the gawds, though. This is a whole look. But if we're going to just wear signs for attention, literally choose anything else: Stop, Children Crossing, that Free Smells sign from Jimmy Johns. AND she had a reveal! Getty This is that thing where someone shows up to a party giving you a subtle Young Pope nod and then has a shot of Fireball and wants to talk your ear off about voter fraud. GIF She is trying it every which way but successfully. I can't. Follow R. Eric Thomas on Twitter . More from ELLE:
